modName: Liliths  Disemboweler - Custom Sword and Greatsword
summary:
A retexture that got \"slightly\" out of hand. This mod is an upgraded version of my earlier mod \"Lilith\'s Cleavers\" but I decided to release it

descriptionHtml:
[size=30]This mod has been remade => [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34079]Lilith\'s Eviscerator[/url]. I will no longer update this file.[/size]

[youtube]n78CUw3co-8[/youtube]

Lilith\'s Disemboweler - Custom Sword / Greatsword
----------------------------------------

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22903][img]http://users.metropolia.fi/~tommiw/crap/nikibanner.jpg[/img][/url]
(Click to get to the mod\'s page!)

=========================================================================================
Update:
=======
2.0D:
------
-added a version of 2.0 with darker textures and a glow that Lilith\'s Cleavers and Razor have


2.0 update notes:
-----------------

I wasn\'t really satisfied with the old textures so I decided to make a new set and made some changes to the lighting.

- The resolution of all textures has been fixed and optimised. No lag anywhere :)

- I made the old textures available if the new ones don\'t meet your needs. 

DOWNLOAD ONLY ONE OF THE MAIN FILES. Check the picture to see the difference between the old and the new.

Ebony style retexture:
------------------------------

- optimised, works prefectly from the favourites-

- only one resolution = works for all and is hq

Optimized textures -Beta-: 
-----------------------------------
- Set of optimized textures in all sizes (small, mid, big)

- Mid res textures are highly recommended. They\'re pretty much the same as the big ones.

- If equipped through inventory the lag is there, but once done through favourites the lag is non existent (on my pc with mid textures which are 4096x1024 )

- If you decide to try this out, (you should) please make a comment and tell me if it\'s helping or not
=========================================================================================

Description:
- - - - - - - -
Latest version: 1.0

.....................................................................................................................................
This weapon is part of a Weapon set \"Lilith\'s Tools\"
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Lilith\'s Razor - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11908]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Cleavers - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12458]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Disemboweler - This mod

Lilith\'s Decapitator - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13416]LInk[/url]

Lilith\'s Reaver -  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15969]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Sickle - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22368]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Obliterator - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23733]Link[/url]

More weapons coming up ! Even maybe an armor set when the stars are aligned!
......................................................................................................................................

A retexture that got \"slightly\" out of hand.

This mod is an upgraded version of my earlier mod \"Lilith\'s Cleavers\" but I decided to release it 
in its own file as it ended up being quite different from the original.

The mod enables 4 different weapons to be crafted with daedric smithing.

1h: normal (which is quite big) and smaller version

2h: one with basic 2h animations and one with 2h axe animation for extra brutality. 

Note: About the textures

The mod comes with 3 sets of textures that have different resolution:

low res textures: Quite bad quality, non-existent loading time 512x1280

mid res textures: Pretty good quality, moderate loading time 1000x2500

big res textures: maximal quality, long loading time 2000x5000

Take these choises into account if you\'re changing weapons a lot or your pc\'s hardware is not up to date.

Even if you have a powerful pc the big textures still take quite a lot of time to load.



Installion:
- - - - - -

1. Dump everything inside the data folder. Merge if asked. / or use the mod manager. it should work.

2. smaller textures available on the mod\'s site on skyrim nexus.

*I have not tried installing this mod with the nexus download manager. Manual installation is recommended*

Uninstallion:
- - - - - - - - -

Just remove the files you added.
author: wiikki
